desc.en: 收到愛麗絲的聯絡後，老師慌慌張張前往遊戲開發部活動室。為了一堆理由而不得已穿著女僕裝、以及飽受精神折磨的愛麗絲，老師提出克服女僕裝的方法。
desc.jp: 收到愛麗絲的聯絡後，老師慌慌張張前往遊戲開發部活動室。為了一堆理由而不得已穿著女僕裝、以及飽受精神折磨的愛麗絲，老師提出克服女僕裝的方法。
desc.zh_cn: 收到爱丽丝的联系后，老师慌慌张张前往游戏开发部活动室。为了一堆理由而不得已穿着女仆装、以及饱受精神折磨的爱丽丝，老师提出克服女仆装的方法。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: 愛麗絲宣示要好好研究提升女僕等級的方法。老師抱持擔憂的心情前往遊戲開發部活動室，協助愛麗絲以正確的管道了解女僕。
desc.jp: 愛麗絲宣示要好好研究提升女僕等級的方法。老師抱持擔憂的心情前往遊戲開發部活動室，協助愛麗絲以正確的管道了解女僕。
desc.zh_cn: 爱丽丝宣示要好好研究提升女仆等级的方法。老师抱持担忧的心情前往游戏开发部活动室，协助爱丽丝以正确的管道了解女仆。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: 到期日將近，但是綠還是想不起遊戲ID，因而向老師求助。兩人為了取得ID，一起挑戰過去沒玩過的遊戲類型，綠整個人幹勁十足。

desc.en: 綠為了得到名著遊戲的初回限定版而孤軍奮戰，但是為了他人，最後綠放棄了物品。為了心裡大失所望的綠，老師以大人的力量，好不容易才取得綠想要的東西送給綠。
desc.jp: 綠為了得到名著遊戲的初回限定版而孤軍奮戰，但是為了他人，最後綠放棄了物品。為了心裡大失所望的綠，老師以大人的力量，好不容易才取得綠想要的東西送給綠。

desc.en: 桃井為了學習各式各樣的遊戲而把老師叫到社團活動室。雖然兩人一起開始遊戲，但遊戲實在太難，所以桃井直接放棄遊戲了。老師無奈地替桃井把遊戲玩到最後。

desc.en: 桃井看到一則惡評無視復古遊戲的劇情而生氣。桃井很苦惱何謂好的遊戲劇情。老師告訴她，自己想寫的劇情就是好劇情。桃井聽老師這麼說，一下子就恢復精神了。
desc.jp: 桃井看到一則惡評無視復古遊戲的劇情而生氣。桃井很苦惱何謂好的遊戲劇情。老師告訴她，自己想寫的劇情就是好劇情。桃井聽老師這麼說，一下子就恢復精神了。
desc.zh_cn: 桃井看到一则恶评无视复古游戏的剧情而生气。桃井很苦恼何谓好的游戏剧情。老师告诉她，自己想写的剧情就是好剧情。桃井听老师这么说，一下子就恢复精神了。

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

desc.en: 柚子為了作為新研發遊戲的參考而穿上女僕裝。但因為天生自信心不足的關係，認為自己不適合當模特兒，顯得相當不安。老師鼓舞灰心喪志的柚子，並且給予了特別的建議。
desc.jp: 柚子為了作為新研發遊戲的參考而穿上女僕裝。但因為天生自信心不足的關係，認為自己不適合當模特兒，顯得相當不安。老師鼓舞灰心喪志的柚子，並且給予了特別的建議。
desc.zh_cn: 柚子为了作为新研发游戏的参考而穿上女仆装。但因为天生自信心不足的关系，认为自己不适合当模特儿，显得相当不安。老师鼓舞灰心丧志的柚子，并且给予了特别的建议。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: 為了協助柚子打掃，老師前往了遊戲開發部的部室。但柚子說的打掃並不是要清理部室，而是要對電腦進行最佳化。但看見部室一團亂的景象後，老師認為需要打掃，於是便向柚子提議打掃部室。
desc.jp: 為了協助柚子打掃，老師前往了遊戲開發部的部室。但柚子說的打掃並不是要清理部室，而是要對電腦進行最佳化。但看見部室一團亂的景象後，老師認為需要打掃，於是便向柚子提議打掃部室。
desc.zh_cn: 为了协助柚子打扫，老师前往了游戏开发部的部室。但柚子说的打扫并不是要清理部室，而是要对电脑进行优化。但看见部室一团乱的景象后，老师认为需要打扫，于是便向柚子提议打扫部室。

desc.en: After receiving a bizarre letter, Sensei heads over to the Game Development Department and meets Midori and Momoi, two twins hard at work developing video games.
desc.jp: After receiving a bizarre letter, Sensei heads over to the Game Development Department and meets Midori and Momoi, two twins hard at work developing video games.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师收到一封怪信，于是便前往千禧年学园的游戏开发部，在该处见到开发游戏中的双胞胎学生，绿和桃井。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师收到一封怪信，于是便前往千年学园的游戏开发部，在该处见到开发游戏中的双胞胎学生，绿和桃井。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师收到一封怪信，于是便前往千年学园的游戏开发部，在该处见到开发游戏中的双胞胎学生，绿和桃。

desc.en: With a muddy and confused mind, Sensei hears about a strange story about a hero.
desc.jp: With a muddy and confused mind, Sensei hears about a strange story about a hero.
desc.zh_cn: 老师在意识模糊之际，听到了一段奇怪的关于勇者的故事。

desc.en: Sensei finally woke up and found himself at the Game Development Department. He was later told that the reason why he lost consciousness, was because of the direct hit by the PreyStation that Momoi threw out of the window. Momoi and Midori mentioned about their letter.
desc.jp: Sensei finally woke up and found himself at the Game Development Department. He was later told that the reason why he lost consciousness, was because of the direct hit by the PreyStation that Momoi threw out of the window. Momoi and Midori mentioned about their letter.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师最终醒了过来，发现自己到了游戏开发部，并得知是被桃井扔出窗外的PreyStation砸中了才昏迷过去。桃井和绿提到了他们的那封信。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师最终醒了过来，发现自己到了游戏开发部，并得知是被桃井扔出窗外的PreyStation砸中了才昏迷过去。桃井和绿提到了他们的那封信。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师最终醒了过来，发现自己到了游戏开发部，并得知是被桃扔出窗外的PreyStation砸中了才昏迷过去。桃和绿提到了他们的那封信。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。

desc.en: Sensei received the letter from GDD, knowing that they were going to be closed. Arona made a simple introduction about the Millennium School.
desc.jp: Sensei received the letter from GDD, knowing that they were going to be closed. Arona made a simple introduction about the Millennium School.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师收到了游戏开发部的信件，并从中得知了游戏开发部将要被废社的消息；阿罗娜顺便介绍了一些千禧年学院的概况。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师收到了游戏开发部的信件，并从中得知了游戏开发部将要被废社的消息；彩奈顺便介绍了一些千年学院的概况。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: Momoi and Midori made an formal self-introduction to Sensei again and proposed to go to the Ruins altogether. She mentioned that the closure was declared by Yuuka - it was at this moment when everyone was interrupted by a familiar voice.
desc.jp: Momoi and Midori made an formal self-introduction to Sensei again and proposed to go to the Ruins altogether. She mentioned that the closure was declared by Yuuka - it was at this moment when everyone was interrupted by a familiar voice.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井和绿向老师做了自我介绍，并提议一起前往废墟；同时提及废社是优香要求的——然而，此时众人却被一阵声音打断。

desc.en: Seminar's treasurer, Yuuka, intends to shut down the Game Development Department due to its lackluster performance. And so, Midori and Momoi head to the ruins in search of a secret weapon to prevent their club's closure.
desc.jp: Seminar's treasurer, Yuuka, intends to shut down the Game Development Department due to its lackluster performance. And so, Midori and Momoi head to the ruins in search of a secret weapon to prevent their club's closure.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 研讨会的会计优香，打算以游戏开发部实绩不佳为由关闭社团。绿和桃井为了反抗优香，便前往<废墟>寻找秘密武器。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 研讨会的会计优香，打算以游戏开发部实绩不佳为由关闭社团。绿和桃井为了反抗优香，便前往<废墟>寻找秘密武器。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 研讨会的会计优香，打算以游戏开发部实绩不佳为由关闭社团。绿和桃为了反抗优香，便前往<废墟>寻找秘密武器。

desc.en: Yuuka came to explain the situation, stating that the closure was inevitable. Momoi and Midori argued righteously, but was greeted with the mock of their only product - TSC, the very game that won the first place of The Worst Game of The Year.
desc.jp: Yuuka came to explain the situation, stating that the closure was inevitable. Momoi and Midori argued righteously, but was greeted with the mock of their only product - TSC, the very game that won the first place of The Worst Game of The Year.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香前来解释情况，表示废社是板上钉钉的事情。桃井与绿据理力争，但反遭优香冷嘲热讽了一下社团的唯一成果——“年度垃圾游戏排行榜第一名”的《故事·传说·编年史》。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香前来解释情况，表示废社是板上钉钉的事情。桃井与绿据理力争，但反遭优香冷嘲热讽了一下社团的唯一成果——“年度垃圾游戏排行榜第一名”的《故事·传说·编年史》。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香前来解释情况，表示废社是板上钉钉的事情。桃与绿据理力争，但反遭优香冷嘲热讽了一下社团的唯一成果——“年度垃圾游戏排行榜第一名”的《故事·传说·编年史》。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
才不是什么乱七八糟的东西

desc.en: When Yuuka started demanding them to take all the things out and calling them "just some junks", Momoi suddenly made it clear that they'll surely secure the Prize and be at the top one. Though time limited to only two short weeks, Yuuka finally agreed.
desc.jp: When Yuuka started demanding them to take all the things out and calling them "just some junks", Momoi suddenly made it clear that they'll surely secure the Prize and be at the top one. Though time limited to only two short weeks, Yuuka finally agreed.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在优香让两人将东西全部清走，并称它们为“乱七八糟的东西”时，桃井突然声称他们一定能在“千禧年大赏”上拿出成果、斩获名次——但时间只有两周。优香最后同意。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在优香让两人将东西全部清走，并称它们为“乱七八糟的东西”时，桃井突然声称他们一定能在“千年大赏”上拿出成果、斩获名次——但时间只有两周。优香最后同意。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在优香让两人将东西全部清走，并称它们为“乱七八糟的东西”时，桃突然声称他们一定能在“千年大赏”上拿出成果、斩获名次——但时间只有两周。优香最后同意。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: After Yuuka left, the twins talked about their plans, and they mentioned the book named G.Bible in particular. Momoi also said that she won't allow Yuuka to view them and their games, some losers and junks.
desc.jp: After Yuuka left, the twins talked about their plans, and they mentioned the book named G.Bible in particular. Momoi also said that she won't allow Yuuka to view them and their games, some losers and junks.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 离开后，游戏部二人向老师讲述了他们的计划，并提到了《G.Bible》一书。桃井还提到，她不想让优香认为这些游戏就是废品、他们是失败者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 离开后，游戏部二人向老师讲述了他们的计划，并提到了《G.Bible》一书。桃井还提到，她不想让优香认为这些游戏就是废品、他们是失败者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 离开后，游戏部二人向老师讲述了他们的计划，并提到了《G.Bible》一书。桃还提到，她不想让优香认为这些游戏就是废品、他们是失败者。

name.en: On That Day, We Met a Girl
name.jp: On That Day, We Met a Girl
name.zh_cn: 那天,我们与少女相遇了

desc.en: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.jp: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。

desc.en: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.jp: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.zh_cn: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

desc.en: The three fell one by one, and thankfully Sensei was at the bottom providing some buffer. Then, Momoi noticed something.

desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人相继掉了下去，还好老师在底下做了些许缓冲。这时，桃井发现了什么东西。

desc.en: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.jp: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千禧年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。

desc.en: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then revealed her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.
desc.jp: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then revealed her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千禧年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。

desc.en: Aris plays and thoroughly enjoys the Game Development Department's previous title, Tales Saga Chronicle. The club members are touched by her glowing response.
desc.jp: Aris plays and thoroughly enjoys the Game Development Department's previous title, Tales Saga Chronicle. The club members are touched by her glowing response.
desc.zh_cn: 爱丽丝开心地玩着游戏开发部的前作<传说年代记>。游戏开发部全员看她玩得这么开心都大受感动。

desc.en: Momoi and Midori discussed the feasibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of modifying her fixed speech pattern.
desc.jp: Momoi and Midori discussed the feasibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of modifying her fixed speech pattern.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井和绿讨论将爱丽丝伪装成千禧年学生计划的可行性。桃井负责去拿到假学生证，而绿和柚子负责教爱丽丝“说话”，希望将其高度机械化的语音模式修改过来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井和绿讨论将爱丽丝伪装成千年学生计划的可行性。桃井负责去拿到假学生证，而绿和柚子负责教爱丽丝“说话”，希望将其高度机械化的语音模式修改过来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃和绿讨论将爱丽丝伪装成千年学生计划的可行性。桃负责去拿到假学生证，而绿和柚子负责教爱丽丝“说话”，希望将其高度机械化的语音模式修改过来。

desc.en: Momoi left in advance and Midori was troubled with how to teach. At this moment Aris found a magazine about the game they made before. Midori then decided to let Aris try their games, attempting to teach her with in-game dialogues.
desc.jp: Momoi left in advance and Midori was troubled with how to teach. At this moment Aris found a magazine about the game they made before. Midori then decided to let Aris try their games, attempting to teach her with in-game dialogues.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井先行离开，绿为如何教爱丽丝说话而苦恼着。这时，爱丽丝则发现了一本曾经写着他们做的游戏的杂志。绿于是决定让爱丽丝玩玩自己的游戏，试着用游戏中的对话教会爱丽丝。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井先行离开，绿为如何教爱丽丝说话而苦恼着。这时，爱丽丝则发现了一本曾经写着他们做的游戏的杂志。绿于是决定让爱丽丝玩玩自己的游戏，试着用游戏中的对话教会爱丽丝。

desc.en: Aris started the game while Momoi and Midori explained about the game. Though faced with countless failures and crashed her system for several times, she kept going on and eventually made it.
desc.jp: Aris started the game while Momoi and Midori explained about the game. Though faced with countless failures and crashed her system for several times, she kept going on and eventually made it.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝一边开始游戏，一边听桃井和绿的讲解。尽管爱丽丝多次失败且遇到了系统卡死问题，但她仍奋起直追，最终通关。

desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: With the help of Momoi and Midori, Aris was able to reach the True End within 3 hours. When asked about the comments on the game, Aris thought it was fun. Hearing this, Yuzu stepped out of the wardrobe, thanking Aris sincerely.
desc.jp: With the help of Momoi and Midori, Aris was able to reach the True End within 3 hours. When asked about the comments on the game, Aris thought it was fun. Hearing this, Yuzu stepped out of the wardrobe, thanking Aris sincerely.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在桃井和绿两人的帮助下，爱丽丝在三小时内通关了True End。两人问及爱丽丝对游戏的评价时，爱丽丝认为游戏很有意思，听到此言的柚子终于从柜子里出来了。柚子真诚地对爱丽丝道了谢。

desc.en: Aris stays up all night playing through all of the Game Development Department's recommended video games, and by the end of it, has learned to speak more like a regular person. Momoi gives Aris what she'll need to blend in as a student at the Millennium School.
desc.jp: Aris stays up all night playing through all of the Game Development Department's recommended video games, and by the end of it, has learned to speak more like a regular person. Momoi gives Aris what she'll need to blend in as a student at the Millennium School.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝玩游戏开发部学生推荐的游戏玩了一整晚，已经学会人类说话的口吻了。桃井递给爱丽丝各种能伪装成千禧年学园学生的物品。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝玩游戏开发部学生推荐的游戏玩了一整晚，已经学会人类说话的口吻了。桃井递给爱丽丝各种能伪装成千年学园学生的物品。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝玩游戏开发部学生推荐的游戏玩了一整晚，已经学会人类说话的口吻了。桃递给爱丽丝各种能伪装成千年学园学生的物品。

name.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝，千禧年学生一名！

desc.en: Yuzu reintroduced herself to Aris and wanted to recommend RPG games to her. Upon hearing this, the other two joined in too. Aris played games day and night, completing them at an incredible rate.
desc.jp: Yuzu reintroduced herself to Aris and wanted to recommend RPG games to her. Upon hearing this, the other two joined in too. Aris played games day and night, completing them at an incredible rate.
desc.zh_cn: 柚子重新向爱丽丝介绍了自己，并想要为爱丽丝推荐RPG游戏，结果话一出口三人就吵了起来。爱丽丝日夜不停地打着游戏，以超乎常人的速度通关了一部又一部。

desc.en: When everyone woke up, Aris had been much better in the way of her speech. Momoi also got a falsified student ID card. Then, Momoi purposed to take Aris around the Millennium.
desc.jp: When everyone woke up, Aris had been much better in the way of her speech. Momoi also got a falsified student ID card. Then, Momoi purposed to take Aris around the Millennium.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 大家醒来时，爱丽丝的说话方式已经正常了许多，桃井也拿到了伪造的学生证。这时，桃井提出要带爱丽丝参观千禧年。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 大家醒来时，爱丽丝的说话方式已经正常了许多，桃井也拿到了伪造的学生证。这时，桃井提出要带爱丽丝参观千年。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 大家醒来时，爱丽丝的说话方式已经正常了许多，桃也拿到了伪造的学生证。这时，桃提出要带爱丽丝参观千年。

name.en: Much Too Big to Be Called a Gun
name.jp: Much Too Big to Be Called a Gun

desc.en: The Game Development Department heads to the Engineering Department to get Aris a firearm. Aris ends up picking a railgun meant to be attached to an intergalactic battleship. The Engineering Department challenges Aris to a fight to test her abilities.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department heads to the Engineering Department to get Aris a firearm. Aris ends up picking a railgun meant to be attached to an intergalactic battleship. The Engineering Department challenges Aris to a fight to test her abilities.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部学生为了取得能让爱丽丝使用的枪支,便前往 千禧年学园的<工程部>。爱丽丝在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部学生为了取得能让爱丽丝使用的枪支,便前往 千年学园的<工程师部>。爱丽丝在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程师部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部学生为了取得能让爱丽丝使用的枪支,便前往 千年学园的<工程部>。爱丽丝在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。

desc.en: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.
desc.jp: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝熟练地使用从没碰过的轨道炮,压制了工程部。工程部的部长歌原见状，便害怕起爱丽丝卓越的身体素质。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝熟练地使用从没碰过的轨道炮,压制了工程师部。工程师部的部长咏叶见状，便害怕起爱丽丝卓越的身体素质。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝熟练地使用从没碰过的轨道炮,压制了工程部。工程部的部长歌原见状，便害怕起爱丽丝卓越的身体素质。

desc.en: All of the Game Development Department went to the Engineering Department with Aris.
desc.jp: All of the Game Development Department went to the Engineering Department with Aris.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人带着爱丽丝去到了工程部。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人带着爱丽丝去到了工程师部。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人带着爱丽丝去到了工程部。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was then introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also shot a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Department, that they could take it away if they won them.
desc.jp: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was then introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also shot a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Department, that they could take it away if they won them.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 歌原等工程部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。柯托莉主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 咏叶等工程师部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。亚都梨主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程师部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程师部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 歌原等工程部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。琴里主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Hibiki continued adjusting for Aris, yet Utaha noticed that Aris was in fact a machine and was worried for her abilities.

desc.zh_cn_jp: 响继续为爱丽丝的使用进行着一些调整，而歌原察觉到，爱丽丝似乎实际上是一具机械，并对她所具有的能力感到担心。

desc.en: Yuuka visits the Game Development Department to screen their new member's eligibility. Aris practices the art of self-introduction with Midori and Momoi.
desc.jp: Yuuka visits the Game Development Department to screen their new member's eligibility. Aris practices the art of self-introduction with Midori and Momoi.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香为了审查新成员的资格而来到游戏开发部,于是爱丽丝便与绿及桃井一起练习自我介绍。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香为了审查新成员的资格而来到游戏开发部,于是爱丽丝便与绿及桃井一起练习自我介绍。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香为了审查新成员的资格而来到游戏开发部,于是爱丽丝便与绿及桃一起练习自我介绍。

desc.en: Momoi was confident that Aris would be able to pass the screening easily, while Midori didn't think so. Momoi then decided to test that, but the result was not looking good.
desc.jp: Momoi was confident that Aris would be able to pass the screening easily, while Midori didn't think so. Momoi then decided to test that, but the result was not looking good.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井自信地认为爱丽丝能够通过优香的资格审查，而绿则对此仍有顾虑。桃井于是测试爱丽丝的能力，但仍然不很尽人意。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井自信地认为爱丽丝能够通过优香的资格审查，而绿则对此仍有顾虑。桃井于是测试爱丽丝的能力，但仍然不很尽人意。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃自信地认为爱丽丝能够通过优香的资格审查，而绿则对此仍有顾虑。桃于是测试爱丽丝的能力，但仍然不很尽人意。

desc.en: Yuuka visited the Department and met Aris. Pretty surprised, Yuuka said that she had never met such an adorable child. Momoi mentioned about the closure stuff; Yuuka said that due to a change on procedure, the eligibility review is inevitable. Yuuka immediately started her questioning.
desc.jp: Yuuka visited the Department and met Aris. Pretty surprised, Yuuka said that she had never met such an adorable child. Momoi mentioned about the closure stuff; Yuuka said that due to a change on procedure, the eligibility review is inevitable. Yuuka immediately started her questioning.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香视察游戏开发部，遇见了爱丽丝。优香表示自己从来没见过这么可爱的孩子，桃井立刻提出废社事宜。优香表示由于程序变更，资格审查不可避免；她随即开始了对爱丽丝的提问。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香视察游戏开发部，遇见了爱丽丝。优香表示自己从来没见过这么可爱的孩子，桃井立刻提出废社事宜。优香表示由于程序变更，资格审查不可避免；她随即开始了对爱丽丝的提问。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香视察游戏开发部，遇见了爱丽丝。优香表示自己从来没见过这么可爱的孩子，桃立刻提出废社事宜。优香表示由于程序变更，资格审查不可避免；她随即开始了对爱丽丝的提问。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Satisfied with Aris' answers, Yuuka admits Aris as an official member of the club, but remains adamant about shutting down the Game Development Department if their next game doesn't come together. Once again, the club members head to the ruins in search of G.BIBLE.
desc.jp: Satisfied with Aris' answers, Yuuka admits Aris as an official member of the club, but remains adamant about shutting down the Game Development Department if their next game doesn't come together. Once again, the club members head to the ruins in search of G.BIBLE.
desc.zh_cn: 经过几轮问答后，优香同意让爱丽丝成为正式成员。但她威胁说，如果还是做不出好游戏就会关闭游戏开发部。游戏开发部全员再次前往废墟寻找<G.Bible>。

desc.en: Yuuka first whispered to ask whether she, Aris, was being kidnapped or not, but was cut off by Momoi and Midori. Yuuka had to restarted the questioning.
desc.jp: Yuuka first whispered to ask whether she, Aris, was being kidnapped or not, but was cut off by Momoi and Midori. Yuuka had to restarted the questioning.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香首先偷偷问了爱丽丝“你是不是被游戏开发部绑架来的”这个问题，被桃井和绿两人拦下。优香不得不重新开始审问。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香首先偷偷问了爱丽丝“你是不是被游戏开发部绑架来的”这个问题，被桃井和绿两人拦下。优香不得不重新开始审问。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香首先偷偷问了爱丽丝“你是不是被游戏开发部绑架来的”这个问题，被桃和绿两人拦下。优香不得不重新开始审问。

desc.en: Though the speech pattern is somewhat odd, but Yuuka could already feel Aris' love towards games. Therefore, she acknowledged her identity as a member of the Game Development Department. Yet Yuuka also said that due to a sudden change to the related rules, they would still get closed if they couldn't make any products at the end of this month.
desc.jp: Though the speech pattern is somewhat odd, but Yuuka could already feel Aris' love towards games. Therefore, she acknowledged her identity as a member of the Game Development Department. Yet Yuuka also said that due to a sudden change to the related rules, they would still get closed if they couldn't make any products at the end of this month.
desc.zh_cn: 虽然说话很奇怪，但优香业已感受到爱丽丝对游戏的热爱，由此承认了她是游戏开发部的一员。然而优香表示，由于规定突然变更，若月底拿不出成绩，无论什么社团都会被废除。

desc.en: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.jp: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.zh_cn: 游戏开发部一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。爱丽丝在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。

desc.en: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.jp: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.zh_cn: 众人到达了工厂，但爱丽丝却突然记起了什么，自顾自的行动。众人跟随着爱丽丝，找到了一台搭载着“Divi: Sion”系统的电脑。

desc.en: The computer recognized Aris but was about to shut down due to low battery, with data on board going to be lost as well. To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained loudly and unintentionally attracted the robots.
desc.jp: The computer recognized Aris but was about to shut down due to low battery, with data on board going to be lost as well. To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained loudly and unintentionally attracted the robots.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 电脑认出了爱丽丝，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，桃井献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；桃井大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 电脑认出了爱丽丝，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，桃井献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；桃井大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 电脑认出了爱丽丝，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，桃献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；桃大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。

desc.en: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.jp: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<真理社>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<贝里塔斯>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<真理会>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.jp: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真理社的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 贝里塔斯的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 真理会的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃的游戏存档不可恢复，桃听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.jp: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，真理社也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千禧年学生会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，贝里塔斯也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，真理会也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Maki explained the current situation to GDD: the Mirror was stored at the Contraband Room of Seminar's, where C&C is the one who guards it. Momoi immediately decided to retreat, but Kotama said that she knew some intel about C&C.
desc.jp: Maki explained the current situation to GDD: the Mirror was stored at the Contraband Room of Seminar's, where C&C is the one who guards it. Momoi immediately decided to retreat, but Kotama said that she knew some intel about C&C.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真纪向开发部解释了现状：“镜子”被保存在学生会的“扣押品保管所”中，而C&C负责看守那里。桃井听后立刻决定撤退，但小玉突然说自己知道C&C的一些消息。

desc.en: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and wanted Sensei to ask the Engineering Department to join them as well.
desc.jp: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and wanted Sensei to ask the Engineering Department to join them as well.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程部一起行动。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程师部一起行动。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程部一起行动。

desc.en: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.jp: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 战斗后，茜对任务失败一事向尼禄道歉，但尼禄却反而表示，对和女仆部打得不相上下的爱丽丝感兴趣。另一方面，回到社团活动室的游戏开发部一行人试着使用<镜子>解读<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 战斗后，朱音对任务失败一事向宁瑠道歉，但宁瑠却反而表示，对和女仆部打得不相上下的爱丽丝感兴趣。另一方面，回到社团活动室的游戏开发部一行人试着使用<镜子>解读<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 战斗后，茜对任务失败一事向妮露道歉，但妮露却反而表示，对和女仆部打得不相上下的爱丽丝感兴趣。另一方面，回到社团活动室的游戏开发部一行人试着使用<镜子>解读<G.Bible>。

desc.en: Akane apologized for accepting the request and making everyone being humiliated. Neru said the request was cancelled, and she was interested in Aris in particular. She instructed Asuna to grab all the information about the Game Development Department.
desc.jp: Akane apologized for accepting the request and making everyone being humiliated. Neru said the request was cancelled, and she was interested in Aris in particular. She instructed Asuna to grab all the information about the Game Development Department.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 茜为接下该项委托给大家蒙羞抱歉，尼禄则表示大可不必，并表示委托已被取消。尼禄对爱丽丝特别感兴趣，让明日奈等人去查清游戏开发部全员的资料。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 朱音为接下该项委托给大家蒙羞抱歉，宁瑠则表示大可不必，并表示委托已被取消。宁瑠对爱丽丝特别感兴趣，让明日奈等人去查清游戏开发部全员的资料。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 茜为接下该项委托给大家蒙羞抱歉，妮露则表示大可不必，并表示委托已被取消。妮露对爱丽丝特别感兴趣，让明日奈等人去查清游戏开发部全员的资料。

desc.en: As it turns out, G.BIBLE only contains a simple maxim: "Love video games." Their sky-high expectations dashed, the Game Development Department, with the help of Aris, begin development on Tales Saga Chronicle 2.
desc.jp: As it turns out, G.BIBLE only contains a simple maxim: "Love video games." Their sky-high expectations dashed, the Game Development Department, with the help of Aris, begin development on Tales Saga Chronicle 2.
desc.zh_cn: 结果事与愿违，<G.Bible>的内容只是「请热爱游戏吧」这句单纯的句子。这让游戏开发部的学生们跌入失落的深渊。在爱丽丝的打气下，游戏开发部重新振作起来,着手开发<传说年代记2>。

name.en: The True Essence of Making Games
name.jp: The True Essence of Making Games

desc.en: Everyone opened the file full of joy, but was extremely disappointed by the content. Other than the well known "Love video games", none could be found.
desc.jp: Everyone opened the file full of joy, but was extremely disappointed by the content. Other than the well known "Love video games", none could be found.
desc.zh_cn: 众人满心欢喜打开了文件，但内容令人大失所望。除了众所周知的“用心做游戏”外再无其他。

desc.en: Everyone was disappointed. Aris expressed her like for TSC and wanted to make TSC2 with others. Yuzu voiced her approval, rarely.
desc.jp: Everyone was disappointed. Aris expressed her like for TSC and wanted to make TSC2 with others. Yuzu voiced her approval, rarely.
desc.zh_cn: 开发部众人感到十分沮丧。爱丽丝表达了对TSC的喜爱，因此想要与众人将TSC2制作下去。柚子本人也罕见地表达了支持。

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

desc.en: Yuzu recalled the flooding negative comments in the days after the release of TSC. Her self-confidence was greatly damaged. The door was knocked at then, and initially Yuzu thought it was an angry player, but didn't expect to be Momoi and Midori. Both not only spoke highly of TSC, but would also become the members of the GDD afterwards.
desc.jp: Yuzu recalled the flooding negative comments in the days after the release of TSC. Her self-confidence was greatly damaged. The door was knocked at then, and initially Yuzu thought it was an angry player, but didn't expect to be Momoi and Midori. Both not only spoke highly of TSC, but would also become the members of the GDD afterwards.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柚子回想起了TSC发行后几天漫天的差评言论，自尊心大受损伤。这时门突然被敲想，柚子本以为是愤怒的玩家上门，却不想迎来了桃井和绿，两位不仅对TSC评价很高，而且将会成为开发部的成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柚子回想起了TSC发行后几天漫天的差评言论，自尊心大受损伤。这时门突然被敲想，柚子本以为是愤怒的玩家上门，却不想迎来了桃井和绿，两位不仅对TSC评价很高，而且将会成为开发部的成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柚子回想起了TSC发行后几天漫天的差评言论，自尊心大受损伤。这时门突然被敲想，柚子本以为是愤怒的玩家上门，却不想迎来了桃和绿，两位不仅对TSC评价很高，而且将会成为开发部的成员。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。

desc.en: Yuzu expressed her thanks to the other three. She said she was happy to make games with then being friends. Called by Momoi, everyone began their development that would last for less than a week.
desc.jp: Yuzu expressed her thanks to the other three. She said she was happy to make games with then being friends. Called by Momoi, everyone began their development that would last for less than a week.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柚子表达了对其他三人的感谢，表达了自己与伙伴一起做游戏的喜悦之情。在桃井的号召下，众人在开始了不到一周的游戏开发。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柚子表达了对其他三人的感谢，表达了自己与伙伴一起做游戏的喜悦之情。在桃井的号召下，众人在开始了不到一周的游戏开发。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柚子表达了对其他三人的感谢，表达了自己与伙伴一起做游戏的喜悦之情。在桃的号召下，众人在开始了不到一周的游戏开发。

desc.en: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.zh_cn: 游戏开发部一行人勉强赶上截止期限，完成了<传说年代记2>的开发。上传游戏后，游戏开发部社团活动室遭到来历不明的枪击。

desc.en: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.jp: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长尼禄。尼禄说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长宁瑠。宁瑠说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长妮露。妮露说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。

desc.en: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flooding in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by a few bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.jp: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flooding in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by a few bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，桃提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。

desc.en: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.jp: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十一首曲子，常在“招聘”（抽卡）页面播放。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a fight. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer get pursued. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light.
desc.jp: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a fight. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer get pursued. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄前来挑战开发部众人。尼禄先是称赞了柚子的勇气，然后向爱丽丝发出挑战，提出只要能打败她，以前的事情就一笔勾销。尼禄还没反应过来，爱丽丝就抢先发射了光之剑。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠前来挑战开发部众人。宁瑠先是称赞了柚子的勇气，然后向爱丽丝发出挑战，提出只要能打败她，以前的事情就一笔勾销。宁瑠还没反应过来，爱丽丝就抢先发射了光之剑。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露前来挑战开发部众人。妮露先是称赞了柚子的勇气，然后向爱丽丝发出挑战，提出只要能打败她，以前的事情就一笔勾销。妮露还没反应过来，爱丽丝就抢先发射了光之剑。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Though Neru has a significant advantage in melee combat, but Aris, by pointing the railgun towards the floor and firing it, retreated at the cost of injuring herself 48%. Neru decided not to pursue afterwards.
desc.jp: Though Neru has a significant advantage in melee combat, but Aris, by pointing the railgun towards the floor and firing it, retreated at the cost of injuring herself 48%. Neru decided not to pursue afterwards.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 虽然尼禄在近战方面优势显著，但爱丽丝通过将光之剑朝向地面开炮，在自伤48%的情况下先行撤离。尼禄最后决定不再追究。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 虽然宁瑠在近战方面优势显著，但爱丽丝通过将光之剑朝向地面开炮，在自伤48%的情况下先行撤离。宁瑠最后决定不再追究。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 虽然妮露在近战方面优势显著，但爱丽丝通过将光之剑朝向地面开炮，在自伤48%的情况下先行撤离。妮露最后决定不再追究。

desc.en: The Millennium Prize, which gives recognition to the Millennium School's best inventions, awards the Game Development Department a special prize for the development of Tales Saga Chronicle 2. Thanks to this, the club is saved from getting shut down. In the midst of everyone's celebrations, the gaming device installed with the G.BIBLE starts to operate on its own.
desc.jp: The Millennium Prize, which gives recognition to the Millennium School's best inventions, awards the Game Development Department a special prize for the development of Tales Saga Chronicle 2. Thanks to this, the club is saved from getting shut down. In the midst of everyone's celebrations, the gaming device installed with the G.BIBLE starts to operate on its own.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部开发的<传说年代记2>，在选拔千禧年学园优秀发明的<千禧年大赏>中获得特别奖，因而免于游戏开发部的废社危机。在所有人都很开心的时候，安装了<G.Bible>的游戏机自己动了起来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部开发的<传说年代记2>，在选拔千年学园优秀发明的<千年大赏>中获得特别奖，因而免于游戏开发部的废社危机。在所有人都很开心的时候，安装了<G.Bible>的游戏机自己动了起来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部开发的<传说年代记2>，在选拔千年学园优秀发明的<千年大赏>中获得特别奖，因而免于游戏开发部的废社危机。在所有人都很开心的时候，安装了<G.Bible>的游戏机自己动了起来。

desc.en: Aris had a psychological fear on the maid. The damage caused by the combat was carefully handled by the C&C. After everything had all settled, everyone began to watch the live stream of the competition.
desc.jp: Aris had a psychological fear on the maid. The damage caused by the combat was carefully handled by the C&C. After everything had all settled, everyone began to watch the live stream of the competition.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝对女仆装有了心理阴影，与尼禄战斗导致的损坏也被他们妥善处理了。尘埃落定后，众人开始观看比赛的现场直播。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝对女仆装有了心理阴影，与宁瑠战斗导致的损坏也被他们妥善处理了。尘埃落定后，众人开始观看比赛的现场直播。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝对女仆装有了心理阴影，与妮露战斗导致的损坏也被他们妥善处理了。尘埃落定后，众人开始观看比赛的现场直播。

desc.en: The result was announced by Kotori from the Engineering Department. Seven were awarded, but none from the GDD. In despair, Momoi broke the TV with her guns. Everyone was sentimental. Although Yuzu said that she could return to her dorm with courage, Aris became the most worrying one for everyone.
desc.jp: The result was announced by Kotori from the Engineering Department. Seven were awarded, but none from the GDD. In despair, Momoi broke the TV with her guns. Everyone was sentimental. Although Yuzu said that she could return to her dorm with courage, Aris became the most worrying one for everyone.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 比赛结果由工程部的柯托莉发布，总共有七个获奖项目。然而七个播报完都不见开发部的TSC2，桃井绝望之下用枪扫射了屏幕。大家都很感伤，柚子虽然表示自己有勇气回到宿舍，但爱丽丝的去向却成为了众人最担心的一点。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 比赛结果由工程师部的亚都梨发布，总共有七个获奖项目。然而七个播报完都不见开发部的TSC2，桃井绝望之下用枪扫射了屏幕。大家都很感伤，柚子虽然表示自己有勇气回到宿舍，但爱丽丝的去向却成为了众人最担心的一点。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 比赛结果由工程部的琴里发布，总共有七个获奖项目。然而七个播报完都不见开发部的TSC2，桃绝望之下用枪扫射了屏幕。大家都很感伤，柚子虽然表示自己有勇气回到宿舍，但爱丽丝的去向却成为了众人最担心的一点。

desc.en: Yuuka visits the GDD, congratulating they won a reward. As the TV was broken, everyone watched the live stream on their phones. On the livestream, the reviewer spoke highly of the elements for a retro RPG that TSC2 possesses, and therefore a special award was given.

name.en: A Day at the Game Dev Department
name.jp: A Day at the Game Dev Department
name.zh_cn: 游戏开发部的平凡日常

desc.en: Sensei pays the Game Development Department a visit for the first time in a while. The members are fielding ideas for the development of their next project, but get distracted watching Aris playing a video game. Aris struggles mid-game upon encountering a cheating player, but gains a dramatic victory thanks to Yuzu's exhilarating performance. However, they fail to make any progress on plans for their next project, and decide to try again tomorrow.
desc.jp: Sensei pays the Game Development Department a visit for the first time in a while. The members are fielding ideas for the development of their next project, but get distracted watching Aris playing a video game. Aris struggles mid-game upon encountering a cheating player, but gains a dramatic victory thanks to Yuzu's exhilarating performance. However, they fail to make any progress on plans for their next project, and decide to try again tomorrow.
desc.zh_cn: 老师久违地前往游戏开发部部室。成员们为了研发下一部作品而集思广益，但不知不觉却变成了观看爱丽丝玩游戏。爱丽丝在游戏过程中遇见作弊玩家并陷入苦战，但因为柚子活跃的表现而获得戏剧般的胜利。但下一部作品的企划没有任何进展，生活就和平常没有两样。

desc.en: Sensei was invited to the Game Development Department, but somehow started playing fighting games with Momoi. Momoi wanted to continue playing, but was stopped by his sister Midori; it was at this time when Sensei got the know that he was invited to come up with new ideas for their next game.
desc.jp: Sensei was invited to the Game Development Department, but somehow started playing fighting games with Momoi. Momoi wanted to continue playing, but was stopped by his sister Midori; it was at this time when Sensei got the know that he was invited to come up with new ideas for their next game.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师受邀来到游戏开发部，但不知不觉中就和桃井玩起了格斗游戏。桃井想继续和老师玩下去，被妹妹绿拦了下来；这时老师才知道，桃井邀请他来是为了想出下一部游戏的好点子。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师受邀来到游戏开发部，但不知不觉中就和桃井玩起了格斗游戏。桃井想继续和老师玩下去，被妹妹绿拦了下来；这时老师才知道，桃井邀请他来是为了想出下一部游戏的好点子。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师受邀来到游戏开发部，但不知不觉中就和桃玩起了格斗游戏。桃想继续和老师玩下去，被妹妹绿拦了下来；这时老师才知道，桃邀请他来是为了想出下一部游戏的好点子。

desc.en: Momoi argues that the reason why she was playing, was exactly to attempt to analyze the game in the hope of some inspirations. Momoi purposed an mixture of multiple genres and hoped they could win the Millennium Prize by its uniqueness.
desc.jp: Momoi argues that the reason why she was playing, was exactly to attempt to analyze the game in the hope of some inspirations. Momoi purposed an mixture of multiple genres and hoped they could win the Millennium Prize by its uniqueness.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井指出刚刚之所以玩游戏，正是为了试图分析并从中获得一些灵感。桃井的想法是将多种不同风格与类型的游戏结合到一起，希望能够藉由此种异类作品斩获千禧年大奖。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井指出刚刚之所以玩游戏，正是为了试图分析并从中获得一些灵感。桃井的想法是将多种不同风格与类型的游戏结合到一起，希望能够藉由此种异类作品斩获千年大奖。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃指出刚刚之所以玩游戏，正是为了试图分析并从中获得一些灵感。桃的想法是将多种不同风格与类型的游戏结合到一起，希望能够藉由此种异类作品斩获千年大奖。

desc.zh_cn: 等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Aris interrupted the conversation, announcing that Yuzu finally manage to surpass a ten-game winning streak. Momoi explained the so-called "UZQueen Mode" to Sensei. Amazed by Yuzu's exhilarating performance, Aris started trying playing fighting games.
desc.jp: Aris interrupted the conversation, announcing that Yuzu finally manage to surpass a ten-game winning streak. Momoi explained the so-called "UZQueen Mode" to Sensei. Amazed by Yuzu's exhilarating performance, Aris started trying playing fighting games.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝打断了对话，宣布柚子成功超过十连胜。众人都对柚子表示了赞叹。桃井则向老师解释了柚子的所谓“UZQueen模式”，爱丽丝因为向往像柚子一样厉害，于是立刻开始尝试格斗游戏。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝打断了对话，宣布柚子成功超过十连胜。众人都对柚子表示了赞叹。桃井则向老师解释了柚子的所谓“UZQueen模式”，爱丽丝因为向往像柚子一样厉害，于是立刻开始尝试格斗游戏。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝打断了对话，宣布柚子成功超过十连胜。众人都对柚子表示了赞叹。桃则向老师解释了柚子的所谓“UZQueen模式”，爱丽丝因为向往像柚子一样厉害，于是立刻开始尝试格斗游戏。

desc.en:

Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Aris had an opponent in online mode, but unable to deal any damage to him. Everyone soon realized that the opponent was a cheater. When the opponent re-requested for another fight, Yuzu decided to put her hands to it.
desc.jp: Aris had an opponent in online mode, but unable to deal any damage to him. Everyone soon realized that the opponent was a cheater. When the opponent re-requested for another fight, Yuzu decided to put her hands to it.
desc.zh_cn: 爱丽丝在线上模式匹配到了一位对手，但无论如何就是无法攻击到他。众人立刻意识到对方开挂。而当对方要求再战时，柚子出手了。

desc.en: Based on her in-depth insight of game features, combined with professional and precise operations, Yuzu defeated the cheater successfully. Everyone was amazed again. Yuzu said such tricks should not be used unless they don't obey the rules.
desc.jp: Based on her in-depth insight of game features, combined with professional and precise operations, Yuzu defeated the cheater successfully. Everyone was amazed again. Yuzu said such tricks should not be used unless they don't obey the rules.
desc.zh_cn: 柚子通过对游戏特性的深入了解与专业精准的操作战胜了开挂的对手。众人再一次赞叹无比，而柚子则表示这些小技俩最好还是不要用的好，但在对于不守规则的人身上则任用无妨。

desc.en: The Game Development Department and Sensei put their heads together to come up with ideas for their new game. When Momoi and Midori fail to find common ground, they decide to settle things once and for all using a method passed down in the Game Development Department through generations. Meanwhile, Yuzu gives Aris a quest to help her find inspiration. Aris ponders how to proceed with the quest when she decides to go on an adventure at the school with Sensei.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and Sensei put their heads together to come up with ideas for their new game. When Momoi and Midori fail to find common ground, they decide to settle things once and for all using a method passed down in the Game Development Department through generations. Meanwhile, Yuzu gives Aris a quest to help her find inspiration. Aris ponders how to proceed with the quest when she decides to go on an adventure at the school with Sensei.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部和老师正在苦思要加入游戏新作的创意。桃井和绿的意见发生分歧，两人为了做出最后的结论，于是决定使用游戏开发部代代相传的方式决胜负。另一方面，柚子为了让爱丽丝能获得特别的灵感，于是给了她任务。苦思该如何运行任务的爱丽丝决定先和老师一起去学园冒险。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部和老师正在苦思要加入游戏新作的创意。桃井和绿的意见发生分歧，两人为了做出最后的结论，于是决定使用游戏开发部代代相传的方式决胜负。另一方面，柚子为了让爱丽丝能获得特别的灵感，于是给了她任务。苦思该如何运行任务的爱丽丝决定先和老师一起去学园冒险。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部和老师正在苦思要加入游戏新作的创意。桃和绿的意见发生分歧，两人为了做出最后的结论，于是决定使用游戏开发部代代相传的方式决胜负。另一方面，柚子为了让爱丽丝能获得特别的灵感，于是给了她任务。苦思该如何运行任务的爱丽丝决定先和老师一起去学园冒险。

desc.en: The Game Development Department started discussing about the game. From the mechanics of the dungeon, to the weapon and arsenal, as well as the art and manifestations. Midori was in great dissatisfaction due to how much emphasis did Momoi put on art. And with the fact that she often changed ideas, many art resources were discarded too. The twins forced Sensei to make a decision.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department started discussing about the game. From the mechanics of the dungeon, to the weapon and arsenal, as well as the art and manifestations. Midori was in great dissatisfaction due to how much emphasis did Momoi put on art. And with the fact that she often changed ideas, many art resources were discarded too. The twins forced Sensei to make a decision.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部众人开始讨论游戏的具体形式。从地牢的机制到武器装备，以及美术和表现形式之类。因为桃井过于强调美术而又常常易稿，许多美术资源都被废弃，引来妹妹绿的非常不满。两人强迫老师做出一个选择。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部众人开始讨论游戏的具体形式。从地牢的机制到武器装备，以及美术和表现形式之类。因为桃井过于强调美术而又常常易稿，许多美术资源都被废弃，引来妹妹绿的非常不满。两人强迫老师做出一个选择。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部众人开始讨论游戏的具体形式。从地牢的机制到武器装备，以及美术和表现形式之类。因为桃过于强调美术而又常常易稿，许多美术资源都被废弃，引来妹妹绿的非常不满。两人强迫老师做出一个选择。

desc.en: Yuzu stopped the twins and said that it should be decided by "that" - playing a game - a tradition in the club. While the two were playing games, Yuzu assigned Aris the task of going outside for a walk, in the hope of some inspirations.
desc.jp: Yuzu stopped the twins and said that it should be decided by "that" - playing a game - a tradition in the club. While the two were playing games, Yuzu assigned Aris the task of going outside for a walk, in the hope of some inspirations.
desc.zh_cn: 柚子及时拦下了两人，表示要用社团的“那个”——进行游戏对局——来决定。就在两人打游戏的时候，柚子分配给了爱丽丝去外边转几圈的任务，希望能够由此获得一些灵感。

desc.en: Aris and Sensei came to the campus. Aris said that both she and Sensei were "Beginner Heros", due to a small argument in which Momoi tries to put BOSSes right at the beginning of the game and was rejected. Aris wondered how to complete Yuzu's missions, and Sensei advised Aris to just go forward to see if anything happens.
desc.jp: Aris and Sensei came to the campus. Aris said that both she and Sensei were "Beginner Heros", due to a small argument in which Momoi tries to put BOSSes right at the beginning of the game and was rejected. Aris wondered how to complete Yuzu's missions, and Sensei advised Aris to just go forward to see if anything happens.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝与老师来到了千禧年校园。爱丽丝说自己和老师都是“见习勇者”，而这源于桃井试图在新手村外放BOSS而被否决一事。爱丽丝对如何进行柚子的任务很苦恼，而老师则建议爱丽丝先前进再说。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝与老师来到了千年校园。爱丽丝说自己和老师都是“见习勇者”，而这源于桃井试图在新手村外放BOSS而被否决一事。爱丽丝对如何进行柚子的任务很苦恼，而老师则建议爱丽丝先前进再说。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝与老师来到了千年校园。爱丽丝说自己和老师都是“见习勇者”，而这源于桃试图在新手村外放BOSS而被否决一事。爱丽丝对如何进行柚子的任务很苦恼，而老师则建议爱丽丝先前进再说。

desc.en: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.jp: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千禧年再次恢复和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 事情告一段落。莉音消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。

desc.en: Himari said that the Eridu City had been sealed and the things afterwards would be handled by her.
desc.jp: Himari said that the Eridu City had been sealed and the things afterwards would be handled by her.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠向老师表示，埃里都已经封存，后事将由她进行负责。

desc.en: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.jp: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长尼禄康复出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎装的主意。时因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为C&C的一员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长宁瑠康复出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎装的主意。季因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为C&C的一员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长妮露康复出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎装的主意。时因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为C&C的一员。

desc.en: The Engineering Department were developing new stuff as always. Veritas were working closely with Super Phenomenon Task Force. Sumire resumed her daily exercises.

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story will go on and never stops.
desc.jp: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story will go on and never stops.
desc.zh_cn: 老师被叫到了游戏开发部，众人表示老师正在开发一款新的游戏，因为之前的那个无法继续扩展思路。爱丽丝邀请老师一起尝试，众人在愉快的氛围下开始了游戏。故事仍在续写中。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。

desc.en: [An MV is playing in this part. The BGM was the ending song for the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department. Considering that most images in the videos are actually a part of the in-game backgrounds, therefore we'll be listing as much as backgrounds as we can.]
desc.jp: [An MV is playing in this part. The BGM was the ending song for the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department. Considering that most images in the videos are actually a part of the in-game backgrounds, therefore we'll be listing as much as backgrounds as we can.]
desc.zh_cn: 【此处为过场视频播放，背景音乐为游戏部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》的片尾曲。由于视频中的图片素材大多在游戏内存在，因而背景一栏将尽量给出具体的图片】

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。

desc.en: 在阿拜多斯挖掘地發現某個東西的凱薩PMC，以及查覺到異變的對策委員會。聽到愛麗絲的身體沒有任何異常的訊息後，遊戲開發部覺得很開心。另一方面，陽葵確認隱藏足跡的莉音留下的情報。
desc.jp: 在阿拜多斯挖掘地發現某個東西的凱薩PMC，以及查覺到異變的對策委員會。聽到愛麗絲的身體沒有任何異常的訊息後，遊戲開發部覺得很開心。另一方面，陽葵確認隱藏足跡的莉音留下的情報。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在阿拜多斯挖掘地发现某个东西的凯萨PMC，以及查觉到异变的对策委员会。听到爱丽丝的身体没有任何异常的消息后，游戏开发部觉得很开心。另一方面，阳葵确认隐藏足迹的莉央留下的情报。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在阿拜多斯挖掘地发现某个东西的凯萨PMC，以及查觉到异变的对策委员会。听到爱丽丝的身体没有任何异常的消息后，游戏开发部觉得很开心。另一方面，阳葵确认隐藏足迹的莉音留下的情报。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在阿拜多斯挖掘地发现某个东西的凯萨PMC，以及查觉到异变的对策委员会。听到爱丽丝的身体没有任何异常的消息后，游戏开发部觉得很开心。另一方面，阳葵确认隐藏足迹的莉央留下的情报。

desc.en: 阿拜多斯沙漠，那裡駐紮著的PMC士兵似乎挖到了一件大東西。他們立刻聯絡了PMC將軍和聯邦學生會的防衛室。
desc.jp: 阿拜多斯沙漠，那裡駐紮著的PMC士兵似乎挖到了一件大東西。他們立刻聯絡了PMC將軍和聯邦學生會的防衛室。
desc.zh_cn: 阿拜多斯沙漠，那里驻扎着的PMC士兵似乎挖到了一件大东西。他们立刻联系了PMC将军和联邦学生会的防卫室。

desc.en: 白子向對策委員會眾人報告了自己所看見的東西，指出這些天來PMC的軍力移動相當奇怪。大家表示同意。星野提出不如大家偷偷溜進去看一眼，但被綾音提醒了之前的事情。這時有人提議詢問老師的意見；雖然害怕打擾老師，綾音還是讓老師有時間就來阿拜多斯一趟。
desc.jp: 白子向對策委員會眾人報告了自己所看見的東西，指出這些天來PMC的軍力移動相當奇怪。大家表示同意。星野提出不如大家偷偷溜進去看一眼，但被綾音提醒了之前的事情。這時有人提議詢問老師的意見；雖然害怕打擾老師，綾音還是讓老師有時間就來阿拜多斯一趟。
desc.zh_cn: 白子向对策委员会众人报告了自己所看见的东西，指出这些天来PMC的军力移动相当奇怪。大家表示同意。星野提出不如大家偷偷溜进去看一眼，但被绫音提醒了之前的事情。这时有人提议询问老师的意见；虽然害怕打扰老师，绫音还是让老师有时间就来阿拜多斯一趟。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: 愛麗絲覺得“宇宙勇者”這個主意非常棒，暢想自己登上宇宙戰艦的那一天。據說工程師部正在不斷鑽研中。最後，桃井提出把遊戲換成“太空歌劇”為背景的“彈幕射擊遊戲”，這讓綠不是特別開心。

desc.en: Kei一直在暗處看著愛麗絲。Kei理解愛麗絲想要擺脫自己“王女”的身份，但指出命運最終會讓她成為那樣。
desc.jp: Kei一直在暗處看著愛麗絲。Kei理解愛麗絲想要擺脫自己“王女”的身份，但指出命運最終會讓她成為那樣。
desc.zh_cn: Kei一直在暗处看着爱丽丝。Kei理解爱丽丝想要摆脱自己“王女”的身份，但指出命运最终会让她成为那样。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: 作為全千年最厲害的駭客，陽葵承擔下了對莉音建造的都市的善後工作――雖然更多像是莉音直接推卸了責任。陽葵訪問了莉音儲存的資料，這才發現她掌握的東西之多，同時也有些理解了她的偏執。
desc.jp: 作為全千年最厲害的駭客，陽葵承擔下了對莉音建造的都市的善後工作――雖然更多像是莉音直接推卸了責任。陽葵訪問了莉音儲存的資料，這才發現她掌握的東西之多，同時也有些理解了她的偏執。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 作为全千禧年最厉害的黑客，日鞠承担下了对莉央建造的都市的善后工作――虽然更多像是莉央直接推卸了责任。日鞠访问了莉央存储的数据，这才发现她掌握的东西之多，同时也有些理解了她的偏执。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 作为全千年最厉害的黑客，阳葵承担下了对莉音建造的都市的善后工作――虽然更多像是莉音直接推卸了责任。阳葵访问了莉音存储的数据，这才发现她掌握的东西之多，同时也有些理解了她的偏执。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 作为全千年最厉害的黑客，日鞠承担下了对莉央建造的都市的善后工作――虽然更多像是莉央直接推卸了责任。日鞠访问了莉央存储的数据，这才发现她掌握的东西之多，同时也有些理解了她的偏执。

desc.en: 季突然出現在兩人面前，嚇到了兩人。季表示莉音只跟她說了“以後自由生活吧”云云，但她並不知道怎麼做，於是就一直待著這裡。陽葵詢問季加入C&C的情況，季表示前輩們待她很好，但只是還有隔閡。最後陽葵決定，就此事先聯絡夏萊請求幫助。

desc.en: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.jp: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.zh_cn: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。

desc.en: 詩音向電視機前的觀眾介紹DU白鳥區的修復程序，提到了在本次事件中各地區的傷亡人數都很低，可謂奇蹟。她隨後提及了關於聖所之塔的情況，指出大樓雖然被破壞，但實際上在會長消失後就並未使用。詩音還提及了關於夏萊的一個傳聞：老師最後在田野裡奔跑著、向學生招手。直播被立刻中斷。
desc.jp: 詩音向電視機前的觀眾介紹DU白鳥區的修復程序，提到了在本次事件中各地區的傷亡人數都很低，可謂奇蹟。她隨後提及了關於聖所之塔的情況，指出大樓雖然被破壞，但實際上在會長消失後就並未使用。詩音還提及了關於夏萊的一個傳聞：老師最後在田野裡奔跑著、向學生招手。直播被立刻中斷。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 诗音向电视机前的观众介绍DU白鸟区的修复进程，提到了在本次事件中各地区的伤亡人数都很低，可谓奇迹。她随后提及了关于圣所之塔的情况，指出大楼虽然被破坏，但实际上在会长消失后就并未使用。诗音还提及了关于夏莱的一个传闻：老师最后在田野里奔跑着、向学生招手。直播被立刻中断。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 诗音向电视机前的观众介绍DU白鸟区的修复进程，提到了在本次事件中各地区的伤亡人数都很低，可谓奇迹。她随后提及了关于圣所之塔的情况，指出大楼虽然被破坏，但实际上在会长消失后就并未使用。诗音还提及了关于沙勒的一个传闻：老师最后在田野里奔跑着、向学生招手。直播被立刻中断。

desc.en: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.jp: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.zh_cn: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。

desc.en: 麻衣代替詩音進行播報。麻衣提到聯邦學生會將重建聖所之塔，具體的承建人似乎包含了凱撒建築，其中可能有一些不透明的東西。螢幕最終被關掉。

desc.en: Mai is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Shinon in some stories.
desc.jp: Mai is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Shinon in some stories.
desc.zh_cn: 麻衣是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作，在部分剧情中与诗音一起出现。

desc.en: 畫面轉到PMC的辦公室，聯邦學生會防衛室的部長香耶正在與PMC的將軍交談。兩人重申了一些共識，指出他們的合作仍然有效，希望之後能提供支援。
desc.jp: 畫面轉到PMC的辦公室，聯邦學生會防衛室的部長香耶正在與PMC的將軍交談。兩人重申了一些共識，指出他們的合作仍然有效，希望之後能提供支援。
desc.zh_cn: 画面转到PMC的办公室，联邦学生会防卫室的部长香耶正在与PMC的将军交谈。两人重申了一些共识，指出他们的合作仍然有效，希望之后能提供支持。

desc.en: Kaya is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Kaya is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 花耶是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Kaiser PMC army's general, known as "General" for short as well. He commands both the usual PMC army and the PMC SOF (Special Operation Force).
desc.jp: Kaiser PMC army's general, known as "General" for short as well. He commands both the usual PMC army and the PMC SOF (Special Operation Force).
desc.zh_cn: 凯撒PMC军队的将军，简称为“将军”。他对常规的PMC军队和PMC特殊部队（SOF）均有控制权。

name.jp: カイザーPMCプレジデント

desc.en: 遊戲開發部四人回到了自己的社團活動室，發現愛麗絲正在做一個小機器人的模型。愛麗絲說這是Kei在消失前，她所看見的東西――也就象徵著Kei本身。
desc.jp: 遊戲開發部四人回到了自己的社團活動室，發現愛麗絲正在做一個小機器人的模型。愛麗絲說這是Kei在消失前，她所看見的東西――也就象徵著Kei本身。
desc.zh_cn: 游戏开发部四人回到了自己的社团活动室，发现爱丽丝正在做一个小机器人的模型。爱丽丝说这是Kei在消失前，她所看见的东西――也就象征着Kei本身。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: 陽葵前來詢問發生了什麼。眾人說在桃井的遊戲機上突然出現了一個以Kei的名字所命名的存檔。陽葵對這種情況先是一驚，但之後表示這一檔案的大小和結構都很奇怪，可能需要莉音的幫助才能解析。
desc.jp: 陽葵前來詢問發生了什麼。眾人說在桃井的遊戲機上突然出現了一個以Kei的名字所命名的存檔。陽葵對這種情況先是一驚，但之後表示這一檔案的大小和結構都很奇怪，可能需要莉音的幫助才能解析。

desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵前来询问发生了什么。众人说在桃井的游戏机上突然出现了一个以Kei的名字所命名的存档。阳葵对这种情况先是一惊，但之后表示这一文件的大小和结构都很奇怪，可能需要莉音的帮助才能解析。

desc.en: 愛麗絲掏出了自己做的小機器人，跟陽葵說這是她照著Kei的樣子做出來的。她希望能將Kei給帶回來。雖然暫時無法解析檔案資料，但陽葵提議為模型增加儲存功能，將檔案存進去，順便當個鑰匙扣。愛麗絲欣然同意。

desc.en: 明太郎把桃井誤認為是C&C的寧瑠，於是便委託桃井幫忙「打掃」。桃井糊里糊塗地接受了委託。遊戲開發部一行人與老師決定協助桃井。
desc.jp: 明太郎把桃井誤認為是C&C的寧瑠，於是便委託桃井幫忙「打掃」。桃井糊里糊塗地接受了委託。遊戲開發部一行人與老師決定協助桃井。
desc.zh_cn: 明太郎把桃井误认为是C&C的宁瑠，于是便委托桃井帮忙「打扫」。桃井糊里糊涂地接受了委托。游戏开发部一行人与老师决定协助桃井。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.zh_cn: 纯白的预告信～虚饰之馆与美学所在之处～

desc.en: 桃井在遊戲中心收到了「打掃」的委託。委託人將桃井誤認為C&C的寧瑠──沒注意到這點就接下委託的桃井和遊戲開發部一行人決定換上女僕裝扮演C&C。究竟一行人能否順利達成委託呢？
desc.jp: 桃井在遊戲中心收到了「打掃」的委託。委託人將桃井誤認為C&C的寧瑠──沒注意到這點就接下委託的桃井和遊戲開發部一行人決定換上女僕裝扮演C&C。究竟一行人能否順利達成委託呢？
desc.zh_cn: 桃井在游戏中心收到了「打扫」的委托。委托人将桃井误认为C&C的宁瑠──没注意到这点就接下委托的桃井和游戏开发部一行人决定换上女仆装扮演C&C。究竟一行人能否顺利达成委托呢？

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green
